commits.author: Robert Muir
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Renames {@code source} to {@code dest} as an atomic operation, * where {@code dest} does not yet exist in the directory. *

* Notes: This method is used by IndexWriter to publish commits. * It is ok if this operation is not truly atomic, for example * both {@code source} and {@code dest} can be visible temporarily. * It is just important that the contents of {@code dest} appear * atomically, or an exception is thrown. */ public abstract void renameFile(String source, String dest) throws IOException;

commits.author: Mike McCandless
